about.title: About Us
about.motto: Because every story deserves an unforgettable beginning.
text: Welcome to the world of Bachelor & Bachelorette Parties Malta, where ordinary days become legendary memories.
We specialize in planning bachelor and bachelorette parties that go beyond the usual – moments filled with emotion, adventure, laughter, and style.

Our mission is to create a tailor-made experience for every group – whether you're dreaming of a luxury yacht escape, an adrenaline-filled weekend, or simply quality time with friends in Malta's stunning surroundings.
We work exclusively with trusted partners and provide accommodation in stylish private farmhouses. From airport pickup to the final toast, we handle every detail.
We believe a bachelorette party should be unique, stress-free, and flawlessly planned.
And that's exactly what we deliver.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before booking your unforgettable Malta experience
terms.intro: At Bachelor/Bachelorette Parties Malta, we strive to provide exceptional experiences for your celebration. To ensure clarity and mutual understanding, we've outlined our terms and conditions below.

section1.title: Introduction
content: By booking or using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions set by "Bachelor/Bachelorette Parties Malta".

section2.title: Booking & Payment
content: All bookings must be confirmed in advance through our website or by direct contact.
Full payment is required at the time of booking to secure your reservation.
Pricing may vary based on package, number of participants, and season.

section3.title: Cancellation & Refund Policy
content: All payments are final. No refunds will be issued under any circumstances, including cancellations, missed events, or changes of plans.
We strongly recommend clients purchase personal travel insurance in case of unexpected issues.

section4.title: Changes or Cancellations by Us
content: If an event must be canceled or modified due to safety concerns, weather, or availability, we will attempt to provide a suitable replacement activity.
No monetary refunds will be given. Replacements are offered at our discretion.

section5.title: Responsibility & Liability
content: Participation in all events is at your own risk.
We are not liable for injuries, property damage, or losses.
All guests are expected to behave respectfully and responsibly.

section6.title: Age & Conduct
content: Inappropriate behavior may lead to removal from the event with no refund or compensation.

section7.title: Agreement
content: By booking, you confirm that you understand and accept these terms fully.
